smashy 0.0.0-9000
  • Reference

Density Task

Source: R/DensityTask.R
TaskDensity.Rd

This task implements mlr3::Task for density estimation tasks. This is an unsupervised task; there is no target column (but there may, e.g., be a weight column). The task_type is "density".

See also

Other density estimation classes: LearnerDensity, MeasureDensity, PredictionDensity, as_prediction_density(), as_task_density(), mlr_learners_density.featureless, mlr_learners_density.np, mlr_measures_density.logloss, mlr_tasks_faithful
